śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ  sarasvatyainamaḥ  atha śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇaṃ prārabhyate  tatrādau karmakāṇḍākhyaḥ pūrvakhaṇḍaḥ prārabhyate  oṃ nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam  devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet 
oṃ ajamajaramanantaṃ jñānarūpaṃ mahāntaṃ śivamamalamanādiṃ bhūtadehādihīnam  sakalakaraṇahīnaṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ taṃ harimamalamamāyaṃ sarvagaṃ vanda ekam 
namasyāmi hariṃ rudraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇādhipam  devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva manovākkarmabhiḥ sadā 
sūtaṃ paurāṇikaṃ śāntaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam  viṣṇubhaktaṃ mahātmānaṃ naimiśāraṇyamāgatam 
tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena upaviṣṭaṃ śubhāsane  dhyāyantaṃ viṣṇumanaghaṃ tamabhyarcyāstuvankavim 
śaunakādyā mahābhāgā naimiṣīyāstapodhanāḥ  munayo ravisaṅkāśāḥ śāntā yajña parāyaṇāḥ 
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  sūta  jānāsi sarvaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchāmastvāmato vayam  devatānāṃ hi ko deva īśvaraḥ pūjya eva kaḥ 
ko dhyeyaḥ ko jagatsraṣṭā jagatpātti ca hanti kaḥ  kasmātpravartate dharmo duṣṭahantā ca kaḥ smṛtaḥ 
tasya devasya kiṃ rūpaṃ jagatsargaḥ kathaṃ mataḥ  kairvrataiḥ sa tu tuṣṭaḥ syātkena yogena vāpyate 
avatārāśca ke tasya kathaṃ vaṃśādisambhavaḥ  varṇāśramādidharmāṇāṃ kaḥ pātā kaḥ pravartakaḥ 
etatsarvaṃ tathānyacca brūhi sūta  mahāmate   nārāyaṇakathāḥ sarvāḥ kathayāsmākamuttamāḥ 
sūta uvāca  purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vakṣye sāraṃ viṣṇukathā śrayam  garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya purā vyāsācchrutaṃ mayā 
eko nārāyaṇo devo devānāmīśvareśvaraḥ  paramātmā paraṃ brahma janmādyasya yato bhavet 
jagato rakṣaṇārthāya vāsudevo 'jaro 'maraḥ  sa kumārādirūpeṇa avatārānkarotyajaḥ 
hariḥ sa prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargamāsthitaḥ  cacāra duścaraṃ brahman brahmacaryamakhaṇḍitam 
dvitīyaṃ tu bhavāyāsya rasātalagatāṃ mahīm  uddhariṣyannupādatte yajñeśaḥ saukaraṃ vapuḥ 
tṛtīyamṛṣisargaṃ tu devarṣitvamupetya saḥ  tantraṃ sātvatamācaṣṭe naiṣkarmyaṃ karmaṇāṃ yataḥ 
naranārāyaṇo bhūtvā turye tepe tapo hariḥ  dharmasaṃ rakṣaṇārthāya pūjitaḥ sa surāsuraiḥ 
pañcamaḥ kapilo nāma siddheśaḥ kālaviplutam  provāca sūraye sāṅkhyaṃ tattvagrāmavi nirṇayam 
ṣaṣṭhamatrerapatyatvaṃ dattaḥ prāpto 'nasūyayā  ānvīkṣikīmalarkāya prahlādādibhya ūcivān 
tataḥ sapta ākūtyāṃ ruceryajño 'bhyajāyata  sutrāmādyaiḥ suragaṇairyaṣṭvā svāyambhuvāntare 
aṣṭame merudevyāṃ tu nābherjāta urukramaḥ  darśayanvartma nārīṇāṃ sarvāśramanamaskṛtam 
ṛṣibhiryācito bheje navamaṃ pārthivaṃ vapuḥ  dugdhairmahauṣadhairviprāstena saṃjīvitāḥ prajāḥ 
rūpaṃ sa jagṛhe mātsyaṃ cākṣuṣāntarasaṃplave  nāvyāropya mahīmayyāmapādvaivasvataṃ manum 
surāsurāṇāmudadhiṃ mathnatāṃ mandarācalam  dadhre kamaṭharūpeṇa pṛṣṭha ekādaśe vibhuḥ 
dhānvantaraṃ dvādaśamaṃ trayodaśamameva ca  āpyāyatsurānanyānmohinyā mohayaṃstriyā 
caturdaśaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ caitya vaira
daityendramūrjitam  dadāra karajairugrairerakāṃ kaṭakudyathā 
pañcadaśaṃ vāmanako bhūtvāgādadhvaraṃ baleḥ  pāda trayaṃ yācamānaḥ pratyāditsustriviṣṭapam 
avatāre ṣoḍaśame paśyanbrahmadruho nṛpān  triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ kupito niḥ kṣattrāmakaronmahīm 
tataḥ saptadaśe jātaḥ satyavatyāṃ parāśarāt  cakre vedataroḥ śākhāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ 
naradevatvamāpannaḥ surakāryacikīrṣayā  samudranigrahādīni cakre kāryāṇyataḥ param 
ekonaviṃśe viṃśatime vṛṣṇiṣu prāpya janmanī  rāmakṛṣṇāviti bhuvo bhagavānaharadbharam 
tataḥ kalestu sandhyānte saṃmohāya suradviṣām  buddho nāmrā jinasutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati 
atha so 'ṣṭamasandhyāyāṃ naṣṭaprāyeṣu rāñjasu  bhavitā viṣṇuyaśaso nāmnā kalkī jagatpatiḥ 
avatārā hyasaṃkhyeyā hareḥ sattvanidherdvijāḥ  manuvedavido hyādyāḥ sarve viṣṇukalāḥ smṛtāḥ 
tasmātsargādayo jātāḥ saṃpūjyāśca vratādinā  purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vyāsaḥ purāsau me 'bravīdidam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye karmakāṇḍe etatpurāṇapravṛttihetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
ṛṣaya ūcuḥ  kathaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava  etatsarvaṃ samākhyāhi paraṃ viṣṇukathāśrayam 
sūta uvāca  ahaṃ hi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato badarikāśramam  tatra dṛṣṭo mayā vyāso dhyāyamānaḥ pareśvaram 
taṃ praṇamyopaviṣṭo 'haṃ pṛṣṭavānhi munīśvaram  sūta uvāca  vyāsa brūhi hare rūpaṃ jagatsargādikaṃ tataḥ 
manye dhyāyasi taṃ yasmāttasmājjānāsi taṃ vibhum  evaṃ pṛṣṭo yathā prāha tathā viprā
nibodhata 
vyāsa uvāca  śṛṇu sūta  pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava  saha nāradadakṣādyairbrahmā māmuktavānyathā 
sūta uvāca  dakṣanāradamukhyaistu yuktaṃ tvāṃ kathamuktavān  brahmā śrīgāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ sāravācakam 
vyāsa uvāca  ahaṃ hi nārado dakṣo bhṛgvādyāḥ praṇipatya tam  sāraṃ brūhīti papracchurbrahmāṇaṃ brahmalokagam 
brahmovāca  purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ rudraṃ ca māṃ yathā  suraiḥ sahābravīdviṣṇustathāhaṃ vyāsa vacmite 
vyāsa uvāca  kathaṃ rudraṃ suraiḥ sārdhamabravīdvai hariḥ purā  purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ brūhi brahmanmahārthakam 
brahmovāca  ahaṃ gato 'driṃ kailāsamindrādyairdaivataiḥ saha  tatra dṛṣṭo mayā rudro dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ padam 
pṛṣṭo namaskṛtaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ devaṃ dhyāyasi śaṅkara  tvatto nānyaṃ paraṃ devaṃ jānāmi brūhi māṃ tataḥ 
sārātsārataraṃ tattvaṃ śrotukāmaḥ suraiḥ saha  rudrauvāca  ahaṃ dhyāyāmi taṃ viṣṇuṃ paramātmānamīśvaram 
sarvadaṃ sarvagaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaprāṇihṛdisthitam  bhasmoddhūlitadehastu jaṭāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitaḥ 
viṣṇorārādhanārthaṃ me vratacaryā pitāmaha  tameva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāraṃ yaṃ cintayāmyaham 
viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ padmanābhaṃ hariṃ dehavivarjitam  śuciṃ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatpadaṃ parameśvaram 
yuktā sarvātmanātmānaṃ taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  yasminviśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca 
guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe sūtre maṇigaṇā iva  sahasrākṣaṃ sahasrāṅghriṃ sahasroruṃ varānanam 
aṇīyasāmaṇīyāṃsaṃ sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām  garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasāmapi 
yaṃ vākyeṣvanuvākyeṣu niṣatsūpaniṣatsu ca  gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu 
purāṇa puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto dvijātiṣu  kṣaye saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktastamupāsyamupāsmahe 
yasmiṃllokāḥ sphurantīme jale śakunayo yathā  ṛtamekākṣaraṃ brahma yattatsadasataḥ param 
arcayanti ca yaṃ devā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ  yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ 
candrādityau ca nayane taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  yasya trilokī jaṭhare masya kāṣṭhāśca bāhavaḥ 
yasyocchvāsaśca pavanaḥ taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasandhiṣu 
kukṣau samudrāścatvārastaṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  paraḥ kālātparo yajñātparaḥ sadasataścayaḥ 
anādirādi rviśvasya taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  manasaścandramā yasya cakṣuṣośca divākaraḥ 
mukhādagniśca saṃjajñe taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  padybhāṃ yasya kṣitirjātā śrotrābhyāṃ ca tathā diśaḥ 
mūrdhabhāgāddivaṃ yasya taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca 
vaṃśānucaritaṃ yasmāttaṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham  yaṃ dhyāyāmyahametasmādūjāmaḥ sāramīkṣitum 
brahmovāca  ityukto 'haṃ purā rudraḥ śvetadvīpanivāsinam  stutvā praṇamya taṃ viṣṇuṃ śrotukāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ 
asmākaṃ madhyato rudra uvāca parameśvaram  sārāntsārataraṃ viṣṇuṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstaṃ praṇamya vai 
brahmovāca  yathā papraccha māṃ vyāsa stathāsau bhagavān bhavaḥ  papraccha viṣṇuṃ devādyaiḥ śṛṇvatāmamaraiḥ saha 
rudra uvāca  hare kathaya deveśa  devadevaḥ ka īśvaraḥ  ko dhyeyaḥ kaśca vai pūjyaḥ kairvratai stuṣyate paraḥ 
kairdharmaiḥ kaiśca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharmapūjayā  kenācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syātkiṃ tadrūpaṃ ca tasya vai 
kasmāddevājjagajjātaṃ jagatpālayate cakaḥ  kīdṛśairavatāraiśca kasminyāti layaṃ jagat 
sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca  kasmāddevātpravartante kasmimannetatpratiṣṭhitam 
etatsarvaṃ hare  brūhi yaccānyadapi kiñcana  parameśvaramāhātmyaṃ yuktayogādikaṃ tathā 
tathāṣṭādaśa vidyāśca harī rudraṃ tato 'bravīt  hariruvāca  śṛṇu rudra  pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha 
ahaṃ hi devo devānāṃ sarvalokeśvareśvaraḥ  ahaṃ dhyeyaśca pūjyaśca stutyohaṃ statibhiḥ suraiḥ 
ahaṃ hi pūjito rudra  dadāmi paramāṃ gatim  niyamaiśca vrataistuṣṭa ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ 
jagatsthiterahaṃ bījaṃ jagatkartā tvahaṃ śiva   duṣṭanigrahakartā hi dharmagoptā tvahaṃ hara  
avatāraiśca matsyādyaiḥ pālayāmyakhilaṃ jagat  ahaṃ mantrāśca mantrārthaḥ pūjādhyānaparo hyaham 
svargādīnāṃ ca kartāhaṃ svargādīnyahameva ca  yogī yogohamevādyaḥ purāṇānyahamevaca 
jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyameva ca  sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ 
dhyānaṃ pūjopahāro 'haṃ maṇḍalānyahameva ca  itihāsānyahaṃ rudra  sarvavedā hyahaṃ śiva  
sarvajñānānyahaṃ śambho  brahmātmāhamahaṃ śiva   ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham 
ahaṃ sākṣātsadācāro dharmo 'haṃ vaiṣṇavo hyaham  varṇāśramāstathā cāhaṃ taddharmo 'haṃ purātanaḥ 
yamo 'haṃ niyamo rudra  vratāni vividhāni ca  ahaṃ sūryastathā candro maṅgalādīnyahaṃ tathā 
purā māṃ garuḍaḥ pakṣī tapasārādhayadbhuvi  tuṣṭa ūce varaṃ brūhi matto vavre varaṃ sa tu 
garuḍa uvāca  mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare  yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat 
dāsyādvimokṣayiṣyāmi yathāhaṃ vāhanastava  mahābalo mahāvīryaḥ sarvajño nāgadāraṇaḥ 
purāṇasaṃhitākartā yathāhaṃ syāṃ tathā kuruṃ  viṣṇuruvāca  yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati 
nāgadāsyānmātaraṃ tvaṃ vinatāṃ mokṣayiṣyasi  devādīnsakalāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayiṣyasi 
mahābalo vāhanastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi viṣārdanaḥ  purāṇaṃ matprasādācca mama māhātmyavācakam 
yaduktaṃ matsvarūpaṃ ca tava cāvirbhaviṣyati  gāruḍaṃ tava nāmnā talloke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati 
yathāhaṃ devadevānāṃ śrīḥ khyāto vinatāsuta  tathā khyātiṃ purāṇeṣu gāruḍaṃ gāruḍaiṣyati 
yathāhaṃ kīrtanīyo 'tha tathā tvaṃ garuḍātmanā  māṃ dhyātvā pakṣimukhyedaṃ purāṇaṃ gada gāruḍam 
ityukto garuḍo rudra  kaśyapāyāha pṛcchate  kaśyapo gāruḍaṃ śrutvā vṛkṣaṃ dagdhamajīvayat 
svayaṃ cānyamanā bhūtvā vidyayānyānya jīvayat  yakṣi oṃuṃsvāhājāpī vidyayaṃ gāruḍī parā  garuḍoktaṃ gāruḍaṃ hi śṛṇu rudra  madātmakam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ  vyāso vyāsādahaṃ vakṣyehaṃ te śaunaka naimiṣe 
munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ madhye sargādyaṃ devapūjanam  tīrthaṃ bhuvanakośaṃ ca manvantaramihocyate 
varṇāśramādidharmāśca dānarājādidharmakāḥ  vyavahāro vrataṃ vaṃśā vaidyakaṃ sanidānakam 
aṅgāni pralayo dharmakāmārthajñānamuttamam  saprapañcaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ kṛtaṃ viṣṇornigadyate 
purāṇe gāruḍe sarvaṃ garuḍo bhagavānatha  vāsudevaprasādena sāmarthyātiśayairyutaḥ 
bhutvā harervāhanaṃ ca sargādīnāṃ ca kāraṇam  devānvijitya garuḍo hyamṛtāharaṇaṃ tathā 
cakre kṣudhā hṛtaṃ yasya brahmāṇḍamudare hareḥ  yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ 
kaśyapo gāruḍādvṛkṣaṃ dagdhaṃ cājīvayadyataḥ  garuḍaḥ sa haristena proktaṃ śrīkaśyapāya ca 
tacchrīmadrāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvadaṃ paṭhatastava  vakṣye vyāsaṃ namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tadyathā 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
rudra uvāca  sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca  vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana 
hariruvāca  śṛṇu rudra pravakṣyāmi sargādīnpāpanāśanām  sargasthitilayāntāṃ tāṃ viṣṇoḥ krīḍāṃ purātanīm 
naranārāyaṇo devo vāsudevo nirañjanaḥ  paramātmā paraṃ brahma jagajjanilayādikṛt 
tadetatsarvamevaitavdyaktāvyaktasvarūpavat  tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa ca sthitam 
vyaktaṃ viṣṇustathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca  krīḍato bālakasyeva ceṣṭāstasya niśāmaya 
anādinidhano dhātā tvanantaḥ puruṣottamaḥ  tasmādbhavati cāvyaktaṃ tasmādātmāpi jāyate 
tasmāhuddhirmanastasmāttataḥ khaṃ pavana stataḥ  tasmāttejastatastvāpastato bhūmistato 'bhavat 
aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi  śarīragrahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyarthaṃ kurute prabhuḥ 
brahmā caturmukho bhūtvā rajomātrādhikaḥ sadā  śarīragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvāsṛjadetaccarācaram 
aṇḍasyāntarjagatsarvaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam  sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca 
apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara  brahmā bhūtvāsṛjadviṣṇurjagatpāti hariḥ svayam 
rudrarūpī ca kalpānte jagatsaṃharate 'khilam  brahmā tu sṛṣṭikāle 'smiñjamadhyagatāṃ mahīm 
daṃṣṭūyoddharati jñātvā vārahīmāsthitastanūm  devādisargānvakṣye 'haṃ saṃkṣepācchṛṇu śaṅkara  
prathamo mahataḥ sargo virūpo brahmaṇastu saḥ   nanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ 
vaikārikastṛtīyastu sargastvaindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ  ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ 
mukhyasargaścaturthastu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ  tiryaksrotāstu yaḥ proktastiryagyonyaḥ sa ucyate 
 tadūrdhvastotasāṃ ṣaṣṭho devasargastu sa smṛtaḥ   tator'vāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā nuṣaḥ 
aṣṭamo 'nugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikastāmasastu saḥ  pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ 
prākṛto vaikṛtaścāpi 
kaumāro navamaḥ smṛtaḥ  sthāvarāntāḥ surādyāstu prajā rudra  caturvidhāḥ 
brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ  tato devāsurapitṝnmānuṣāṃśca catuṣṭayam 
sisṛkṣurambhāṃsyetāni svamātmānamayūyujat  vyaktātmanastamomātrādudriktāstatprajāpateḥ 
sisṛkṣerjaghanātpūrvamasurā jajñire tataḥ  utsasarja tatastāṃ tu tamomātrātmikāṃ tanūm 
tamomātrā tanustyaktā śaṅkarābhūdvibhāvarī  yakṣopakṣāṃsi taddehe prītimāpustataḥ surāḥ 
sattvodriktāstu mukhataḥ saṃbhūtā brahmaṇo hara   sattvaprāyā tanustena santyaktā sāpyabhūddinam 
tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā  sattvamātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya pitaraśca tato 'bhavan 
sā cotsṛṣṭābhavatsandhyā dinanaktāntarasthitiḥ  rajomātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya manuṣyāstvabhavaṃstataḥ 
sā tyaktā cābhavajjyotsnā prāksandhyā yābhidhīyate  jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai 
rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca  kṣuttṛṭkṣāmā amṛgbhakṣā rākṣasā rakṣaṇācca ye 
yakṣākhyā jakṣaṇājjñeyāḥ sarpā vai keśasarpaṇāt  jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ 
gāyanto jajñire vācaṃ gandharvāpsarasaśca ye  svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān 
sṛṣṭavānudarādrāśca pārśvābhyāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ  padybhāṃ caivāntyamātaṅgānmahiṣoṣṭrāvikāṃstathā 
opadhyaḥ phalamūlinyo romabhyastasya jajñire  gaurajaḥ puruṣo medhyo hyaśvāśvataragardabhāḥ 
etān grāmyānpaśūnprāhurāraṇyāṃśca nibodha me  śvāpadaṃ dvikhuraṃ hastivānarāḥ pakṣipañcamāḥ 
audakāḥ paśavaḥ ṣaṣṭhāḥ saptamāśca sarīsṛpāḥ  pūrvādibhyo mukhebhyastu ṛgvedādyāḥ prajajñire 
āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ  ūrubhyāṃ tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padybhāma jāyata 
brahmaloko brāhmaṇānāṃ śākraḥ kṣattriyajanmanām  mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām 
brahmacārivratasthānāṃ brahmalokaḥ prajāyate  prājāpatyaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ yathāvihitakāriṇām 
sthānaṃ saptaṛṣīṇāṃ ca tathaiva vanavāsinām  yatīnāmakṣayaṃ sthānaṃ yadṛcchāgāmināṃ sadā 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
iriruvāca  kṛtvehāmutrasaṃsthānaṃ prajāsargaṃ tu mānasam  athāmṛjatprajākartṝnbhānasāṃstanayānprabhuḥ 
dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam  bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca 
marīcimatryaṅgirasau pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum  vasiṣṭhaṃ nāradaṃ caiva pitṝnbarhiṣadastathā 
agniṣvāttāṃśca kavyādānājyapāṃśca sukālinaḥ  upahūtāṃstathā dīpyāṃ prā
strīṃśca mūrtivivarjitān 
caturo mūrtiyuktāṃśca aṅguṣṭhāddakṣamīśvaram  vāmāṃ guṣṭhāttasya bhāryāmasṛjatpadmasambhavaḥ 
tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ  dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān 
rudra putrā babhūvurhi asaṃkhyātā mahābalāḥ  bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām 
bhṛgordhātāvidhātārau janayāmāsa sā śubhā  śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā 
tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam  āyatirniyatiścaiva manoḥ kanye mahātmanaḥ 
dhātāvidhātroste bhārye tayorjātau sutāvubhau  prāṇaścaiva mṛkaṇḍuśca mārkaṇḍeyo mṛkaṇḍutaḥ 
patni marīceḥ sambhūtiḥ paurṇamāsamasūyata  virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ 
smṛteścāṃṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ prasūtāḥ kanyakāstathā  sinīvālī kuhūścaiva rākā cānumatistathā 
anasūyā tathaivātrerjajñe putrānakalmaṣān  somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam 
prītyāṃ pulastyabhāryāyāṃ dattolistatsuto 'bhavat  karṃmaśaścārthavīraśca sahiṣṇuśca sutatrayam 
kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ  kratośca sumatirbhāryā bālakhilyānasūyata 
ṣaṣṭiryāni sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmūrdharetasām  aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrāṇāṃ jvaladbhāskaravarcasām 
ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ  rajogātrordhabāhuśca śaraṇaścānaghastathā 
sutapāḥ śukra ityete sarve saptarṣayo 'malāḥ  svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye 
tasmātsvāhā sutāṃllebhe trīnudāraujaso hara   phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ 
pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā  te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ 
mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī  tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ 
ātmānameva kṛtavānprajāpālyaṃ manuṃ hara   śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām 
svāyambhuvo manurdevaḥ patnitve jagṛhe vibhuḥ  tasmācca puruṣāddevī śatarūpā vyajāyata 
priyavratottānapādau prasūtyākūtisaṃjñete  devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau 
prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame  ruceryajño dakṣiṇābhūddakṣiṇāyāṃ ca yajñataḥ 
abhavandvādaśa sutā yāmā nāma mahābalāḥ  caturvośatikanyāśca sṛṣṭavāndakṣa uttamāḥ 
śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā  buddhirlajjā vapuḥ śāntirṛddhiḥ kīrtistnayodaśī 
patnyarthaṃ pratijagrāha dharmo dākṣāyaṇīprabhuḥ  khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā 
sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā  bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ 
pulastyaḥ pulahaścaiva kratuścarṣivarastathā  ātrirvasiṣṭho vahniśca pitaraśca yathākramam 
khyātyādyā jagṛhuḥ kanyā munayo munisattamāḥ  śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam 
santoṣaṃ ca tathā tuṣṭirlobhaṃ puṣṭirasūyata  medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca 
bodhaṃ buddhistathā lajjā vinayaṃ vapurātmajam  vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata 
sukhamṛddhiryaśaḥ kīrtirityete dharmasūnavaḥ  kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate 
īje kadācidyajñena hayamedhena dakṣakaḥ  tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ 
bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā  anāhūtā satī prāptā dakṣeṇaivāvamānitā 
tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt  śambhorbhāryābhavadraurī tasyāṃ jajñe vināyakaḥ 
kumāraścaiva bhṛṅgīśaḥ kruddho rudraḥ pratāpavān  vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk  dhruvasyānvayasambhūto manuṣyastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  uttānapādādabhavatsurucyāmuttamaḥ sutaḥ  sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam 
muniprasādādārādhya devadevaṃ janārdanam  dhruvasya tanayaḥ śliṣṭirmahābalaparākramaḥ 
tasya prācīnavarhistu putrastasyāpyudāradhīḥ  divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ 
ripoḥ putrastathā śrīmāṃścākṣuṣaḥ kīrtito manuḥ  rurustasya sutaḥ śrīmānaṅgastasyāpi cātmajaḥ 
aṅgasya veṇaḥ putrastu nāstiko dharmavarjitaḥ  adharṃmakārī veṇana
śca munibhiśca kuśairhataḥ 
ūruṃ mamanthuḥ putrārthe tato 'sya tanayo 'bhavat  hrasvo 'timātraḥ kṛṣṇāṅgo niṣīdeti tato 'bruvan 
niṣādastena vai jāto bindhyaśailanivāsakaḥ  tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ 
tasmāttasya suto jāto viṣṇormānasarūpadhṛk  puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau 
dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi  antardhānaḥ pṛthoḥ putro tahavirdhānastadātmajaḥ 
prācīnavaharstetputraḥ pṛthivyāmekarāḍ babhau  upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām 
tasmātsuṣāva sāmudrī daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ  sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ 
apṛthagadharṃmacaraṇāste 'tapyanta mahattapaḥ  daśavarṣasahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ 
prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa  abhavaddhavaśāpena tasyāṃ dakṣo 'bhavattataḥ 
asṛjanmanasā dakṣaḥ prajāḥ pūrvaṃ caturvodhāḥ  nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu 
maithunena tataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumaicchatprajāpatiḥ  asikrīmāvahadbhāryāṃ vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ 
tasya putrasahasraṃ tu vairaṇyāṃ samapadyata  nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ 
dakṣaputrasahasraṃ ca teṣu naṣṭeṣu sṛṣṭavān  śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara  
dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi  nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ 
yajñe dhvaste 'tha dakṣo 'pi śaśāprograṃ maheśvaram  stutvātvāmupacāraiśca pūjayiṣyanti śaṅkara 
janmāntare 'pi vaireṇa te vinaśyanti śaṅkara   tasmādvairaṃ na kartavyaṃ kadācidapi kenacit  asiknyāṃ mahiṣyāṃ
janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaro hyatha 
ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau  dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha 
caturdaśa kaśyapāya aṣṭāviṃśātimindave  pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā 
manoramāṃ bhānumatīṃ viśālāṃ bahudāmatha  dakṣaḥ prādānmahādeva  catasro 'riṣṭanemaye ne 
sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām  arundhatī vasuryārjā
mī lambā bhānurmarudvatī 
saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa  dharṃmapatnyaḥ samākhyātāḥ kaśyapasya vadāmyaham 
aditirditirdanuḥ kālā hyanāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ  kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā 
viśvedevāstu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyānvyajāyata  marutvatyāṃ marutvanto vasostu vasavastathā 
bhānostu bhānavo rudra  muhūrtācca muhūrtajāḥ  lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā jā mitaḥ 
pṛthivīviṣayaṃ sarvamarutvatyāṃ vyajāyata  saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi 
āpo dhruvaśca somaśca dharaścaivānilo 'nalaḥ  pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ 
āpasya putro vetuṇḍiḥ ṇḍaḥ
śramaḥ śrānto dhvanistathā  dhruvasya putro bhagavānkālo lokaprakālanaḥ 
somasya bhagavānvarcā varcasvī yena jāyate  dharasya putro druhiṇo hutahavyavahastathā 
manoharāyāṃ śiśiraḥ prāṇo 'tha ramaṇastathā  anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ 
avijñātagatiścaiva dvau putrāvanilasya tu  agniputraḥ kumārastu śarastambe vyajāyat 
tasya śākho viśākhaśca naigameyaśca pṛṣṭajaḥ  apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ 
pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam  viśvakarṃmā prabhāsasya vikhyāto devavardhakiḥ 
ajaikapādahirbudhnyastvaṣṭā rudraśca vīryavān  tvaṣṭuścāpyātmajaḥ putro viśvarūpo mahātapāḥ 
haraśca bahurūpaśca tryambakaścāparājitaḥ  vṛṣākapiśca śambhuśca kaparde raivatastathā 
mṛgavyādhaśca śarvaśca kapālī ca mahāmune   ekādaśaite kathitā rudrāstribhuvaneśvarāḥ 
adityāṃ kaśyapāccaiva sūryā dvādaśa jajñire  viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca 
vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca  aśumāṃśca bhagaścaiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ 
saptaviṃśatiḥ somasya patnyo nakṣatrasaṃjñitāḥ  hiraṇyakaśipurdityāṃ hiraṇyākṣo 'bhavattadā 
siṃhikā cābhavatkanyā vipracittiparigrahā  hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāścatvāraḥ pṛthulaujasaḥ 
anuhrādaśca hrādaśca prahrādaścaiva vīryavān  saṃhrādaścāvamasteṣāṃ prahrādo viṣṇutatparaḥ 
saṃhrādaputra āyuṣmāñchibirvāṣkala eva ca  virocanaśca prāhrādirbalirjajñe virocanāt 
baleḥ putraśataṃ tvāsīdvāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ vṛṣadhvaja   hiraṇyākṣasutāścāsansarva eva mahābalāḥ 
utkuraḥ śakuniścaiva bhūtasantāpanastathā  mahānāgo mahābāhuḥ kālanābhastathāparaḥ 
abhavandanuputrāśca dvimūrdhā śaṅkarastathā  ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ kapilaḥ śambarastathā 
ekacakro mahābāhustārakaśca mahābalaḥ  svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ 
ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān  svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī 
upadānavī hayaśirāḥ prakhyātā varakanyakāḥ  vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā 
ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ  tābhyāṃ putrasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭirdānavasattamāḥ 
paulomāḥ kālakañjāśca mārīcatanayāḥ smṛtāḥ  siṃhikāyāṃ samutpannā vipracittisutāstathā 
vyaṃśaḥ śalyaśca balavānnabhaścaiva mahābalaḥ  vātāpirnamuciścaiva ilvalaḥ khasṛmāṃstathā 
añja nta ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca  nivātakavacā daityāḥ prahrādasya kule 'bhavan 
ṣaṭ sutāśca mahāsattvāstāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ  śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike 
śukī śukānajanayadulūkī pratyalūkakān  śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi 
śukyaudakānpakṣigaṇānsugrīvī tu vyajāyata  aśvānuṣṭān gardabhāṃśca tāmrāvaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ 
vinatāyāstu putrau dvau vikhyātau garuḍāruṇau  surasāyāḥ sahasraṃ tu sarpāṇāmamitaujasām 
kādraveyāśca phaṇinaḥ sahasramamitaujasaḥ  teṣā prādhānā bhūteśa  śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ 
śaṅkhaḥ śveto mahāpadmaḥ śaṅkhaḥ
kambalāśvatarau tathā  elāpatrastathā nāgaḥ karkoṭakadhanañjayau 
gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ  krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān 
gāstu vai janayāmāsa surabhirmahiṣāṃstathā  irā vṛkṣalatāballīstṛṇajātīśca sarvaśaḥ 
khagā ca yakṣarakṣāṃsi munirapsarasastathā  ariṣṭā tu mahāsattvān gandharvānsamajījanat 
devā ekonapañcāśanmaruto hyabhavanniti  ekajyo tiśca dvirjyoticaturjyotistathaiva ca 
ekaśukro dviśukraśca triśukraśca mahābalaḥ  īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā 
mitaśca samitaścaiva sumitaśca mahābalaḥ  ṛtajitsatyajiccaiva suṣeṇaḥ senajittathā 
atimitro 'pyamitraśca dūramitro 'jitastathā  ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo camaso dhruvaḥ 
vidhāraṇaśca durmedhā ayamekagaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ  īdṛśaśca sadṛkṣaśca etādṛkṣo mitāśanaḥ 
etenaḥ prasadṛkṣaśca surataśca mahātapāḥ  hetumānprasavastadvatsurabhaśca mahāyaśāḥ 
nādirugro dhvanirbhāso bimukto vikṣipaḥ sahaḥ  dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ 
udveṣaṇo gaṇo nāma vāyuskandhe tu saptame  etatsarvaṃ hare rūpaṃ rājāno dānavāḥ surāḥ 
sūryādi parivāreṇa manvādyā ījire harim 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe uttānapādavaṃśādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ

rudra uvāca  sūryādipūjanaṃ brūhi kṛtaṃ svāyambhuvādibhiḥ  bhuktimuktipradaṃ sāraṃ vyāsa  saṃkṣepataḥ param 
hariruvāca  sūryādipūjāṃ vakṣyāmi dharṃmakāmādikārikām 
oṃ sūryāsanāya namaḥ  oṃ namaḥ sūryamūrtaye  oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ  oṃ somāya namaḥ  oṃ maṅgalāya namaḥ  oṃ budhāya namaḥ
oṃ bṛhaspataye namaḥ  oṃ śukrāya namaḥ  oṃ śanaiścarāya namaḥ  oṃ rāhave namaḥ  oṃ ketave namaḥ  oṃ tejaścaṇḍāya namaḥ 
āsanāvāhanaṃ pādyamarghyamācamanaṃ tathā  snānaṃ vastropavītañca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam 
dīpakaṃ ca naskāraṃ pradakṣiṇavisarjane  sūryādīnāṃ sadā kuryāditi mantrairvṛṣadhvaja  
oṃ hrāṃśivāya namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ śivamūrtaye śivāya namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ śirase svāhā  oṃ hrūṃ śikhāyai vaṣaṭ  oṃ hrai kavacāya huṃ  oṃ hrauṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ  oṃ hraḥ astrāya namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ sadyojātaya namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ vāmadevāya namaḥ  oṃ hrūṃ aghorāya namaḥ  oṃ hraiṃ tatpuruṣāya namaḥ  oṃ hrauṃ īśānāya namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ gauryai namaḥ  oṃ hrauṃ gurubhyo namaḥ  oṃ hrauṃ indrāya namaḥ  oṃ hrauṃ caṇḍāya namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ aghorāya namaḥ  oṃ vāsudevāsanāya namaḥ  oṃ vāsudavamūrtaye namaḥ  oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ  oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ  oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate pradyumnāya namaḥ  oṃ aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate aniruddhāya namaḥ  oṃ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ  oṃ tatsabdrahyaṇe namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ viṣṇave namaḥ  oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namaḥ  oṃ bhūḥ oṃ namo bhagavate varāhāya namaḥ  oṃ kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ vainateyāya namaḥ  oṃ jaṃ khaṃ raṃ sudarśa nāya namaḥ  oṃ khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadaiyau namaḥ  oṃ vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ  oṃ ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai namaḥ  oṃ gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ saṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ  oṃ dhaṃ ṣaṃ vaṃ saṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ  oṃ saṃ daṃ laṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ  oṃ ṭhaṃ caṃ bhaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ  oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ  oṃ indrādidikpālebhyo namaḥ  oṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ 
āsanādīnhareratairmantrairmantrairdadyādvṛṣadhvaja   viṣṇuśaktyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ pūjāṃ śṛṇu śubhapradām 
oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ śirase namaḥ  oṃ hrūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ  oṃ hraiṃ kavacāya namaḥ  oṃ hrauṃ netratrayāya namaḥ  oṃ hraḥ astrāya namaḥ 
śraddhā ṛddhiḥ kalā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ  oṃ hrīṅkārādyā namo 'ntāśca sarasvatyāśca śaktayaḥ 
kṣetrapālāya namaḥ  oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ  oṃ paramagurubhyo namaḥ 
padmasthāyāḥ sarasvatyā āsanādyaṃ prakalpayet  sūryādīnāṃ svakairprantraiḥ pavitrārohaṇaṃ tathā 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryādīnāṃ sarasvatyāśca pūjanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  bhūmiṣṭhe maṇḍape snātvā maṇḍale viṣṇumarcayet  pañcaraṅgikacūrṇena vajranābhaṃ tu maṇḍalam 
ṣoḍaśaiḥ koṣṭhakaistatra saṃmitaṃ rudra kārayet  caturthapañcakoṇeṣu sūtrapātaṃ tu kārayet 
koṇasūtrādubhayataḥ koṇā ye tatra saṃsthitāḥ  teṣu caiva prakurvīta sūtrapātaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ 
tadanantarakoṇeṣu evameva hi kārayet  prathamā nābhiruddiṣṭā madhye rekhāprasaṃgame 
antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ  pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet 
antarā sa dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ pādonaṃ bhrāmayeddhara   anena nābhisūtrasya karṇikāṃ bhrāmayecchiva  
karṇikāyā dvibhāgena kesarāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥ  tadagreṇa sadā vidvāndalānyeva samālikhet 
sarveṣu nābhikṣetraṣu mānenānena suvrata   padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit 
ādisūtravibhāgena dvārāṇi parikalpayet  dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet 
karṇikāṃ pītavarṇena sitaraktādikesaraiḥ  antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca 
kṛṣṇavarṇena rajasā caturaśraṃ prapūrayet  dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale 
sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam  kṛtvaiva maṇḍalañcādau nyāsaṃ kṛtvārcayeddharim 
hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā  pradyumnaṃ śirasi nyasya śikhāyāmaniruddhakam 
brahmāṇaṃ sarvagātreṣu karayoḥ śrīdharaṃ tathā  ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim 
nyasetsaṅkarṣaṇaṃ pūrve pradyumnaṃ caiva dakṣiṇe  aniruddhaṃ paścime ca brihmāṇaṃ cottare nyaset 
śrīdharaṃ rudrakoṇeṣu indrādīndikṣu vinyaset  tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  samaye yā dīkṣitaḥ śiṣyo baddhanetrastu vāsasā  aṣṭāhutiśataṃ tasya mūlamantreṇa homayet 
dviguṇaṃ putrake homaṃ triguṇaṃ sādhake matam  nirvāṇadeśike rudra  caturguṇamudāhṛtam 
guruviṣṇudvijastrīṇāṃ hantā badhyastvaścadīkṣitaiḥ  atha dīkṣāṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmādharmakṣayaṅkarīm 
upaveśya bahiḥ śiṣyāndhāraṇaṃ teṣu kārayet  vāyavyā kalayā rudra śoṣyamāṇānvicintayet 
āgreyyā dahyamānāṃśca plāvitānambhasā punaḥ  tejastejāsi taṃ jīvamekīkṛtya samākṣipet 
prāṇavaṃ cintayevdyomni śarīre 'nyattu kāraṇam  ekaikaṃ yo jayettatra kṣetrajñaṃ dehakāraṇāt 
utpādya yojayetpaścādekaikaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja  maṇḍalādiṣvaśaktastu kalpayitvār'cayeddharim 
caturdvāraṃ bhavettacca brahmatīrthādanukramāt  hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ 
karṇikā talahastantu nakhānyasya tu kesarāḥ  tatrārcayeddhariṃ dhyātvā sūryandvagnayantareva ca 
taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ  haste viṣṇuḥ sthito yasmādviṣṇuhastastatastvayam  naśyanti sparśanāttasya pātakānyakhilāni ca 
guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā  devasya pramukhaṃ kṛtvā puṣpamevārpayettataḥ  puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ 
tannāma kārayettasya strīṇāṃ nāmāṅkitaṃ svayam  śūdrāṇāṃ dāsasaṃyuktaṃ kārayettu vicakṣaṇaḥ 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  r śyādipūjāṃ pravarśyāmi sthaṇḍilādiṣu siddhaye  śrīṃ hrīṃ mahālakṣmyai namaḥ  śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāddhṛdayaṃ ca śiraḥ śikhām  kavacaṃ netramastraṃ ca āsanaṃ mūrtimarcayet 
maṇḍale padmagarbhe ca caturdvāri rajo 'nvite  catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣe khākṣyādi maṇḍalam 
khākṣīndusūryagaṃ sarvaṃ khādivedenduvartanāt  lakṣmīmaṅgāni caikasminkoṇe durgāṃ gaṇaṃ gurum 
kṣetrapālamathāgnyādau homāñjuhāva kāmabhāk  oṃ ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ 
anena pūjayellakṣmīṃ pūrvoktaparivārakaiḥ  oṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ 
oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvācaṃ  navavyūhārcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ kaśyapāya hi  jīvamutkṣipya mūrdhanyaṃ nābhyāṃ vyomniniveśayet 
tatoramiti bījena dahedbhūtātmakaṃ vapuḥ  yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet 
lamityanena bījena plāvayetsacarācaram  vamityanena bījena cintayedamṛtaṃ tataḥ 
tato budvudamadhye tu pītavāsāścaturbhujaḥ  ahaṃ matastathātmānaṃ dhyānena paricintayet 
mantranyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāttrividhaṃ karadehayoḥ  dvādaśākṣarabījena uktabījairanantaram 
ṣaḍaṅgena tataḥ kuryātsākṣādyena harirbhavet  dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhamārabhya madhyāṅguṣṭhandale nyaset 
madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ  hṛcchirasi śikhāvarṃmavakkrākṣyudahapṛṣṭhataḥ 
bāhvośca karayorjānvoḥ pādayoścāpi vinyaset  padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet 
cintayettatra sarveśaṃ paraṃ tattvamanāmayam  kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set 
tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā  nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayorvinyasetkramāt 
pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset  aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntaṃ vinyasedvījapañcakam 
karamadhye netrabījamaṅganyāsa'pyayaṃ kramaḥ  hṛdaye hṛdayaṃ nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset 
śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau  netraṃ netre vidhātavyamastrañca karayordvayoḥ 
tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret  hṛdaye cintayetpūrvaṃ yogapīṭhaṃ samāhitaḥ 
dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam  āgneyādau ca pūrvādāvadharmādīṃśca vinyaset 
ebhiḥ paricchannatanuṃ pīṭhabhūtaṃ tadātmakam  anantaṃ vinsetpaścātpūrvakāyonnataṃ sthitam 
tato vidyātsarojātaṃ dalāṣṭasamadigdalam  sitābjaṃ śatapatrāḍhyaṃ viprakīrṇordhakarṇikam 
dhyātvā vedādinā paścātsūryasomānalātmanām  maṇḍalāni kramādevamuparyupari cintayet 
tataḥ pūrvādidiksaṃsthāḥ śaktīḥ keśavagocarāḥ  vimalādyā nyasedaṣṭau navamīṃ karṇikāgatām 
evaṃ dhyātvā samabhyarcya yogapīṭhamanantaram  manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ 
hṛdayādīni pūrvādicaturdigdalayogataḥ  madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ 
saṅkarṣaṇādibījāni pūrvādikramayogataḥ  dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset 
sudarśanaṃ sahasrāraṃ dakṣiṇe dvāri vinyaset  śriyaṃ dakṣiṇato nyasya lakṣmīmuttaratastathā 
dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset  devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset 
tadvatkhaṅgaṃ tathā cakraṃ nyasetpārśvadvayordvayam  tato 'ntarlokapālāṃśca svadigbhedena vinyaset 
vajrādīnyāyudhānyeva tathaiva viniveśayet  ūrghvaṃ brihma tathānantamadhaśca paricintayet 
sarvaṃ dhyātveti saṃpūjya mudrāḥ sandarśayettataḥ  añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī 
vandanī hṛdayāsaktātsārdhaṃ dakṣiṇatonnatā  ūrdhāṅguṇṭho vāmamuṣṭirdakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhabandhanaḥ 
savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ  tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ 
kaniṣṭhādipramokeṇa aṣṭau mudrā yathākramam  aṣṭānāṃ pūrvabījānāṃ kramaśastvavadhārayet 
aṅguṣṭhena kaniṣṭhāntaṃ nāmayitvāṅgulitrayam  mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam 
savyahastaṃ tathottānaṃ kṛtvordhaṃ bhrāmayecchanaiḥ  navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā 
muṣṭidvayamathottānamṛjvaikaikena mocayet  utkuñcayetsarvamuktā aṅgamudreyamucyate 
muṣṭidvayamatho baddhā evamevānupūrvaśaḥ  daśānāṃ lokapālānāṃ mudrāśca kramayogataḥ 
suramādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca upāntyañcāntyameva ca  vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam 
praṇavastatsadityetad huṃ kṣaiṃ bhūriti mantrakāḥ  nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ 
sitāruṇaharidrābhā nīlaśyāmallohitāḥ  meghāgnimadupiṅgābhā varṇato navanāmakāḥ 
kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam  ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam 
ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā  ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet 
chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca  ityaṅgāniyathāyogaṃ devadevasya vai daśā 
garuḍo 'mbujasaṃkāśo gadā caivāsitākṛtiḥ  puṣṭiḥ śirīṣapuṣpābhā lakṣmīḥ kāñcanasannibhā 
pūrṇacandranibhaḥ śaṅkhaḥ kaustubhastvaruṇadyutiḥ  cakraṃ sūryasahasrābhaṃ śrīvatsaḥ kundasannibhaḥ 
pañcavarṇanibhā mālā hyananto meghasannibhaḥ  vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ 
arghyapādyādi vai dadyātpuṇḍarīkākṣavidyayā 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ

iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye

namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ  oṃ oṃ namaḥ  oṃ naṃ namaḥ  oṃ moṃ namaḥ  oṃ oṃ bhaṃ namaḥ  oṃ gaṃ namaḥ  oṃ vaṃ namaḥ  oṃ teṃ namaḥ  oṃ vāṃ namaḥ  oṃ suṃ namaḥ  oṃ deṃ namaḥ  oṃ vāṃ namaḥ  oṃ yaṃ namaḥ  oṃ oṃ namaḥ  oṃ naṃ namaḥ  oṃ moṃ namaḥ  oṃ nāṃ namaḥ  oṃ rāṃ namaḥ  oṃ ṇāṃ namaḥ  oṃ yaṃ namaḥ  oṃ naṃnoṃ bhagavateṃ vāṃsuṃdevāyaṃ oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ  oṃ puruṣottamāya namaḥ

devadevaṃ svabījena aṅgādibhirathācyutam  pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit 
bhrāmayitvānalaṃ kuṇḍe pūjayecca śubhaiḥ phalaiḥ  pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset 
vāsudevākhyatattvena hutvā cāṣṭottaraṃ śatam  saṃkarṣaṇādibījena yajetṣaṭkaṃ tathaiva ca 
trayantrayaṃ tathāṅgānāmekaikāndikpatīṃstathā  pūrṇāhutiṃ tathaivānte dadyātsamyagupasthitaḥ 
vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet  upaviśya punarmudrāṃ darśayitvā nametpunaḥ 
nityamevaṃvidhaṃ homaṃ naimitte dviguṇaṃ bhavet  gacchagaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo nirañjanaḥ

śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  pravakṣyāmyadhunā hyetadvaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ śubham  namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam 
prācyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo  tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te 
yāmyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo  tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  halamādāya saunande namaste puruṣottama 
pratīcyāṃ rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo  tvāmaha śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām 
uttarasyāṃ jagannātha  bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  khaḍgamādāya carṃmātha astraśāstrādikaṃ hare  
namaste rakṣa rakṣoghna  aiśānyāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  pāñcajanyaṃ mahāśaṅkhamanughoṣyaṃ ca paṅkajam 
pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara  candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā 
nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin  vaijayantīṃ smapragṛhya śrīvatsaṃ kaṇṭhabhūṣaṇam 
vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te  vainateyaṃ samāruhya tvantarikṣe janārdana  
māṃ rakṣasvājita sadā namaste 'stvaparājita  viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale 
akūpāra namastubhyaṃ mahāmīna namo 'stu pte  karaśīrṣādyaṅgulīṣu satya tvaṃ bāhupañjaram 
kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama  etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat 
purā rakṣārthamīśānyāḥ kātyāyanyā vṛṣadhvaja  nāśāyāmāsa sā yena cāmarānmahiṣāsuram 
dānavaṃ raktabījaṃ ca anyāṃśca surakaṇṭakān  etajjapannaro bhaktyā śatrūnvijayate sadā 
iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  atha yogaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktikaraṃ param  dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ 
tacchṛṇuṣva maheśāna sarvapāpavināśanam  viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaro 'nantaḥ ṣaḍbhirbhūparivarjitaḥ 
vāsudevo jagannātho brahmātmāsmyahameva hi  dehidehasthito nityaḥ sarvadehavivarjitaḥ 
dehadharṃmavihīnaśca kṣarākṣaravivarjitaḥ  ṣaḍvidheṣu sthito draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hyatīndriyaḥ 
taddharṃmarahitaḥ sraṣṭā nāmagotravivarjitaḥ  mantā manaḥ sthito devo manasā parivarjitaḥ 
manodharṃmavihīnaśca vijñānaṃ jñānameva ca  boddhā buddhisthitaḥ sākṣī sarvajño buddhivarjitaḥ 
buddhidharṃmavihīnaśca sarvaḥ sarvagato manaḥ  sarvaprāṇivinirmuktaḥ prāṇadharṃmavivarjitaḥ 
prāṇaprāṇo mahāśānto bhayena parivarjitaḥ  ahaṅkārādihīnaśca taddharṃmaparivarjitaḥ 
tatsākṣī tanniyantā ca paramānandarūpakaḥ  jāgratsvapnasuṣuptisthastatsākṣī tadvivarjitaḥ 
turīyaḥ paramo dhātā dṛgrūpo guṇavarjitaḥ  mukto buddho 'jaro vyāpī satya ātmāsmyahaṃ śivaḥ 
evaṃ ye mānavā vijñā dhyāyantīśaṃ paraṃ padam  prāpnuyuste ca tadrūpaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā 
iti dhyānaṃ samākhyātaṃ tava śaṅkara suvrata  paṭhedya etatsatataṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dhyānayogo nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ

pṛthivyā ca vihīnaśca śabdena ca vivarjitaḥ  sparśena ca vihīnaśca sarvarūpavivarjitaḥ

prāṇisthaḥ

bhāratastarunāśanaḥ  cakrapaḥ śrīpatiścaiva nṛpāṇāṃ cakravartinām

iti nāmasahasraṃ te vṛṣabhadhvaja kīrtitam  devasya viṣṇorīśaśya sarvapāpavināśanam 
paṭhandvijaśca viṣṇutvaṃ kṣatriyo jayamāpnuyāt  vaiśyo dhanaṃ sukhaṃ śūdro viṣṇubhaktisamanvitaḥ 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīviṣṇusahasranāmastotranirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
rudra uvāca  punardhyānaṃ samācakṣva śaṅkhacakragadādhara  viṣṇorīśasya devasya śuddhasya paramātmanaḥ 
hariruvāca  śṛṇu rudra  harerdhyānaṃ saṃsāratarunāśanam  dṛśirūpamanantaṃ ca sarvavyāpyajamavyayam 
akṣaraṃ sarvagaṃ nityaṃ mahabdrahmāsti kevalam  sarvasya jagato mūlaṃ sarvagaṃ parameśavaram 
sarvabhūtahṛdisthaṃ vai sarvabhūtamaheśvaram  sarvādhāraṃ nirādhāraṃ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam 
alepakaṃ tathā muktaṃ muktayogivicititam  sthūladehavihīnaṃ ca cakṣuṣā parivarjitam 
vāgindriyavihīnaṃ ca prāṇidharṃmavivarjitam  pādendriyavihīnaṃ ca vāgdharmaparivarjitam  pāyūpasthavihīnaṃ ca sarvaiṃndriya vivarjitam 
manovirahitaṃ tadvanmanodharṃmavivarjitam  buddhyā vihīnaṃ deveśaṃ cetasā parivarjitam 
ahaṅkāravihīnaṃ vai buddhidharṃmavivarjitam  prāṇena rahitaṃ caiva hyapānena vivarjitam 
vyānākhyavāyuhīnaṃ vai prāṇadharṃmavivarjitam  hariruvāca  punaḥ sūryarcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ bhṛgave purā 
oṃ khakholkāya namaḥ  sūryasya mūlamantro 'yaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakaḥ 
oṃ khakholkāya tridaśāya namaḥ  oṃ vici ṭhaṭha śirase namaḥ  oṃ jñānine ṭhaṭha śikhāyai namaḥ  oṃ sahasraraśmaye ṭhaṭha kavacāya namaḥ 
oṃ sarvatejo 'dhipataye ṭhaṭha astrāya namaḥ  oṃ jvalajvala prajvalaprajvala ṭhaṭha namaḥ 
agniprākāramantro 'yaṃ sūryasyāghavināśanaḥ  oṃ ādityāya vidmahe
viśvabhā vāya dhīmahi
tannaḥ sūrya pracodayāt 
sakalīkaraṇaṃ kuryādrāyatryā bhāskarasya ca  dharṃmātmane ca pūrvasminyamā yeti ca dakṣiṇe 
daṇḍanāyakāya tato daivatāyeti cottare  śyāmapiṅgalamaiśānyāmāgneyyāṃ dīkṣitaṃ yajet 
vajrapāṇiṃ ca nairṛtyāṃ bhūrbhuvaḥsvaśca vāyave  oṃ candrāya nakṣatrādhipataye namaḥ  oṃ aṅgārakāya kṣitisutāya namaḥ  oṃ budhāya somasutāya namaḥ  oṃ vāgīśvarāya sarvavidyādhipataye namaḥ  oṃ śukrāya maharṣaye bhṛgusutāya namaḥ  oṃ śanaiścarāya sūryātmajāya namaḥ  oṃ rāhave namaḥ  oṃ ketave namaḥ 
pūrvādīśānaparyantā ete pūjyā vṛṣadhvaja  oṃ anūkāya namaḥ  oṃ prathamanāthāya namaḥ  oṃ buddhāya namaḥ 
oṃ bhagavannaparimitamayūkhamālin  sakalajagatpate  saptāśvavāhana  caturbhuja  paramasiddhiprada  visphuliṅgapiṅgala  tata ehyehi idamarghyaṃ mama śirasi gataṃ gṛhṇagṛhṇa tejograrūpam anagna  jvalajvala ṭhaṭha namaḥ 
anenāvāhya mantreṇa tataḥ sūryaṃ visarjayet  oṃ namo bhagavate ādityāya sahasra kiraṇāya gaccha sukhaṃ punarāgamanāyeti 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe haridhyānasūryārcanayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  punaḥ sūryārcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ dhanadāya hi  aṣṭapatraṃ likhetpadmaṃ śucau deśe sakarṇikam 
āvāhanīṃ tato baddhā mudrāmāvāhayedravim  khakholkaṃ sthāpya mudrāṃ tu sthāpayenmantrarūpiṇīm 
āgneyyāṃ diśi devasya hṛdayaṃ sthāpayecchiva   aiśānyāṃ tu śiraḥ sthāpyaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vinyasecchikhām 
paurandaryāṃ nyaseddharṃmamekāgrasthitamānasaḥ  vāyavyāṃ caiva netraṃ tu vāruṇyāmastrameva ca 
aiśānyāṃ sthāpayetsomaṃ paurandaryāṃ tu lohitam  āgneyyāṃ somatanayaṃ yāmyāṃ caiva bṛhaspatim 
nairṛtyāṃ dānavaguruṃ vāruṇyāṃ tu śanaiścaram  vāyavyāṃ ca tathā ketuṃ kauberyāṃ rāhumeva ca 
dvitīyāyāṃ tu kakṣāyāṃ sūryāndvādaśa pūjayet  bhagaḥ sūryor'yyamā caiva mitro vai varuṇastathā 
savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃśca mahābalaḥ  tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā cendro dvādaśo viṣṇurucyate 
pūrvādāvarcayeddevānindrādīñchraddhayā naraḥ  jayā ca vijayā caiva jayanti cāparājitā  śeṣaśca vāsukiścaiva nāgānityādi pūjayet 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryārcana vidhirnāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya vakṣye mṛtyuñjayārcanam  uddhārapūrvakaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ matam 
oṅkāraṃ pūrvamuddhṛtya juhu
ṅkāṃraṃ tadanantaram  savisargaṃ tṛtīyaṃ syānmṛtyudāridrayamardanam 
īśaviṣṇavarkadevyādikavacaṃ sarvasādhakam  amṛteśaṃ mahāmantrantryakṣaraṃ pūjanaṃ samam  japanānmṛtyuhīnāḥ syuḥ sarvapāpavivarjitāḥ 
śatajapyādvedaphalaṃ yajñatīrthaphalaṃ labhet  aṣṭottaraśatājjāpyātrisandhyaṃ mṛtyu śatrujita 
dhyāyecca sitapadmasthaṃ varadaṃ cābhayaṃ kare  dvābhyāṃ cāmṛtakumbhaṃ tu cintayedamṛteśvaram 
tasyaivāṅgagatāṃ devīmamṛtāmṛtabhāṣiṇīvini m  kalaśaṃ dakṣiṇe haste vāmahaste saroruham 
japedaṣṭasahasraṃ vai trisandhyaṃ māsamekataḥ  jarāmṛtyumahāvyādhiśatrucchivaśāntidam 
āhvānaṃ sthāpanaṃ rodhaṃ sannidhānaṃ niveśanam  pādyamā camanaṃ snānamarghyaṃ sraganulepanam 
dīpāṃbaraṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ ca naivadyaṃ pānavījanam  mātrāmudrājapadhyānaṃ dakṣiṇā cāhutiḥ stutiḥ 
vādyaṃ gatiṃ ca nṛtyaṃ ca nyāsayogaṃ pradakṣiṇam  praṇatirmantraśayyā ca vandanaṃ ca visarjanam 
ṣaḍaṅgādiprakāreṇa pūjanaṃ tu kramoditam  parameśamukhodrītaṃ yo jānāti sa pūjakaḥ 
arghyapātrārcanaṃ cādāvastreṇaiva tu tāḍanam  śodhanaṃ kavacenaiva amṛtīkaraṇaṃ tataḥ 
pūjā cādhāraśaktyādeḥ prāṇāyāmaṃ tathāsane  pīṭhasuddhiṃ tataḥ kuryācchoṣaṇādyaistataḥ smaret 
ātmānaṃ devarūpaṃ ca karāṅganyāsakaṃ caret  ātmānaṃ pūjayetpaścājyo tīrūpaṃ hṛdabjataḥ 
mūrtau vā sthaṇḍile vāpi kṣipetpuṣpaṃ tu bhāsvaram  āhvānadvārapūjārthaṃ pūjā cādhāraśaktitaḥ 
sānnidhyakaraṇaṃ deve parivārasya pūjanam  aṅgaṣaṭkasya pūjā vai kartavyā ca vipaścitaiḥ 
dharmādayaśca śakrādyāḥ sāyudhāḥ parivārakāḥ  yugavedamuhūrtāśca pūjeyaṃ bhuktimuktikṛt 
mātṛkāśca gaṇāṃścādau nandigaṅge ca pūjayet  mahākālaṃ ca yamanāṃ dehalyāṃ pūjayetpurā 
oṃ amṛteśvara oṃ bhairavāya namaḥ  evaṃ oṃ juṃ haṃsaḥ sūryāya namaḥ 
evaṃ śivāya kṛṣṇāya brahmaṇe ca gaṇāya ca  caṇḍikāyai sarasvatyai mahālakṣmādi pūjayet 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśāvye ācārakāṇḍe 'mṛteśamṛtyuñjayapūjanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  prāṇeśvaraṃ gāruḍaṃ ca śivoktaṃ pravadāmyaham  sthānānyādau pravakṣyāmi nāgadaṣṭo na jīvati 
citāvalmīkaśailādau kape ca vivare taroḥ  daṃśe rekhātrayaṃ yasya pracchannaṃ sa na jīvati 
ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca karkaṭe meṣe mūlāśleṣāmaghādiṣu  kakṣāśroṇigale sandhau śaṅkhakarṇodarādiṣu 
daṇḍī śastradharo bhikṣurna gnādiḥ kāladūtakaḥ  bāhau ca vakkre grīvāyāṃ daṣṭāyāṃ na hi jīvati 
pūrvaṃ dinapatirbhuṅkte ardhayāmaṃ tato 'pare  śeṣā grahāḥ pratidinaṃ ṣaṭsaṃkhyā parivartanaiḥ 
nāgabhogaḥ kramāñjñeyo rātrau bāṇavivartanaiḥ  śeṣor'kaḥ phaṇipaścandrastakṣako bhauma īritaḥ 
karkoṭo jño guruḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca bhārgavaḥ  śaṅkhaḥ śanaiścaro rāhuḥ kulikaścāhayo grahāḥ 
rātrau divā suragurorbhāge syādamarāntakaḥ  paṅgoḥ kāle divā rāhuḥ kulikena saha sthitaḥ 
yāmārdhasandhisaṃsthāṃ ca velāṃ kālavatīṃ caret  bāṇadviṣaḍvahnivājiyugabhūrekabhāgataḥ 
divā ṣaḍedanetrādripañcatrimānuṣāṃśakaiḥ  pādāṅguṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe gulphe jānuni liṅgake 
nābhau hṛdi stanataṭe kaṇṭhe nāsāpuṭe 'kṣiṇi  karṇayośca bhruvoḥ śaṅkhe mastake pratipatkramāt 
tiṣṭhaccandraśca jīvecca puṃso dakṣiṇabhāgake  kāyasya vāmabhāge tu striyā vāyuvahātkarāt 
amṛtastatkṛto moho nivarteta ca mardanāt  ātmanaḥ paramaṃ bījaṃ haṃsākhyaṃ sphaṭikāmalam 
dātavyaṃ viṣapāpaghnaṃ bījaṃ tasya caturvidham  vindupañcasvarayutamādyamuktaṃ dvitīyakam  ṣaṣṭhārūḍhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ syātsavisargaṃ caturthakam  oṃ kuru kule svāhā 
vidyā trailokyarakṣārthaṃ garuḍena dhṛtā purā  vadhepsurnāganāgānāṃ mukhe 'tha praṇavaṃ nyaset 
gale kuru nyaseddhīmānkule ca gulphayoḥ smṛtaḥ  svāhā pādayuge caiva yugahā nyāsa īritaḥ 
gṛhe vivikhitā yatra tannāgāḥ saṃtyajanti ca  sahasramantraṃ japtvā tu karṇe sūtraṃ dhṛtaṃ tathā 
yadrṛhe śarkarā japtā kṣiptā nāgāstyajanti tat  saptalakṣasya japyāddhi siddhiḥ prāptā surāsuraiḥ 
oṃ suvarṇarekhe kukkuṭavigraharūpiṇi svāhā  evañcāṣṭadale padma dale varṇayugaṃ likhet 
nāmaitadvāridhārābhiḥ snāto daṣṭo viṣaṃ tyajet  oṃ pakṣi svāhā 
aṅguṣṭhādi kaniṣṭhāntaṃ kare nyasyātha dehake  ke kai vakkre hṛdi liṅge ca pādayorgaruḍasya hi 
nākrāmanti ca tacchāyāṃ svapne 'pi viṣapannagāḥ  yastu lakṣaṃ japeccāsyāḥ sa dṛṣṭvāṣṭyā
nāśayedviṣam 
oṃ hrī hrau hrīṃ bhibhī
ruṇḍāyai svāhā  karṇe japtā tviyaṃ vidyā daṣṭakasya viṣaṃ haret 
a ā nyasettu pādāgre i ī gulaphe 'tha jānuni  u ū e ai kaṭitaṭe o nābhau hṛdi au nyaset 
vakkre amuttamāṅge aḥ nyasedvai haṃsasaṃyutāḥ  haṃso viṣādi ca harejjapto dhyāto 'tha pūjitaḥ 
garuḍo 'hamiti dhyātvā kuryādviṣaharāṃ rīṃ kriyām  haṃmantraṃ gātravinyastaṃ viṣādiharamīritam 
nyasya haṃsaṃ vāmakare nāsāmukhanirodhakṛt  mantro hareddaṣṭakasya tvaṅmāṃsādigataṃ viṣam 
sa vāyunā samākṛṣya daṣṭānāṃ garalaṃ haret  tanau nyaseddaṣṭakasya nīlakaṇṭhādi saṃsmaret 
pītaṃ pratyaṅgirāmūlaṃ taṇḍuladbhirviṣāpaham  punarnavāphalinīnāṃ mūlaṃ vakkrajamīdṛśam 
mūlaṃ śuklabṛhatyāstu karkoṭyāgairikarṇikam  adbhirghṛṣṭaghṛtopetalepo 'yaṃ viṣamardanaḥ 
viṣamṛddhiṃ na vrajecca uṣṇaṃ pibati yo ghṛtam  pañcāṅgaṃ tu śirīṣasya mūlaṃ gṛñjanajaṃ tathā 
sarvāṅgalepataśacāpi pānādvā viṣahṛdbhavet  hrīṃ gonasādiviṣahṛt 
hṛllalāṭavisargāntaṃ dhyātaṃ vaśyā dikṛdbhavet  nyastaṃ yonau vaśetkanyāṃ kuryānmadajalāvilam 
japtvā saptāṣṭasāhasraṃ garutmāniva sarvagaḥ  kaviḥ syācchrutidharī ca vaśyāḥ strīścāyurāpnuyāt  viṣahṛtsyātkathā tadvanmaṇirvyāsaḥ smṛto dhruvam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarpaviṣaharopāyaprāṇeśvaravidyā
nirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  vakṣye tatparamaṃ guhyaṃ śivoktaṃ mantrabṛndakam  pāśaṃ dhanuśca cakraṃ ca mudraraṃ śūlapaṭṭiśam 
etairevāyudhairyuddhe mantraiḥ śatrūñjayennṛpaḥ  mantroddhāraḥ padmapātre ādi pūrvādike likhet 
aṣṭavargaṃ cāṣṭamaṃ ca khyātamīśānapatrake  oṃ kāro brahma bījaṃ syāddhrīṅkāro viṣṇureva ca 
hrīṅkā raśca śivaḥ śūle triśākhe tu kramānnyaset  oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ 
śūlaṃ gṛhītvā hastenābhrāmya cākāśasaṃmukham  taddarśanāndrahā nāgā dṛṣṭvā vā nāśamāpnu yuḥ 
dhūmārakte karaṃ madhye dhyātvā khe cintayennaraḥ  duṣṭā nāgā grahā meghā vinaśyanti ca rākṣasāḥ 
trilokānrakṣayenmantro martyalokasya kā kathā  oṃ jūṃ sūṃ hūṃ phaṭ 
khādirānkīlakānaṣṭau kṣetre saṃmantrya vinyaset  na tatra vajrapātasya sphūrjathvāderupadravaḥ 
garuḍoktairmahāmantraiḥ kīlakānaṣṭa mantrayet  ekaviṃśativārāṇi kṣetre tu nikhanenniśi 
vidyunmūṣakavajrādisamupadrava eva ca  harakṣamalavarayū binduyuktaḥ sadāśivaḥ 
oṃ hrāṃ sadāśivāya namaḥ  tarjanyā vinyasetpiṇḍaṃ ṇḍe
dāḍimīkusumaprabham 
tasyaiva darśanādduṣṭā meghavidyuddipādayaḥ  rākṣasā bhūtaḍākinyaḥ pradravanti diśo daśa 
oṃ hrīṃ gaṇeśāya namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ stambhanādicakrāya namaḥ  oṃ aiṃ brahayaintrai lokyaḍāmarāya namaḥ 
bhairavaṃ piṇḍamākhyātaṃ viṣapāpagrahāpaham  kṣetrasya rakṣaṇaṃ bhūtarākṣasādeḥ pramardanam 
oṃ namaḥ  indravajraṃ kare dhyātvā duṣṭameghādivāraṇam  viṣa śatrugaṇā bhūtā naśyante vajramudrayā 
oṃ kṣuṃkṣa namaḥ  smaretpāśaṃ vāmahaste viṣabhūtādi naśyati  oṃ hrāṃ hro namaḥ  hareduccāraṇānmantro viṣameghagrahādikān 
dhyātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca dahecchedakāstreṇa vai jagat  oṃ kṣṇaṃ kṣma namaḥ  dhyātvā tu bhairavaṃ kuryāndrahabhūtaviṣāpaham 
oṃ lasaddijihvākṣa svāhā  kṣetrādau grahabhūtādiviṣapakṣinivāraṇam 
oṃ kṣva kṣṇaṃ namaḥ  raktena paṭahe likhya śabdātresurgrahādayaḥ  oṃ mara mara mārayamāraya svāhā  oṃ huṃ phaṭ svāhā 
śūlaṃ cāṣṭaśatairmantrya bhrāmaṇācchatruvṛndahṛt  ūrdhaśaktinipātena adhaḥ śaktiṃ nikuñceyet 
pūrake pūritā mantrāḥ kumbhakena sumantritāḥ  praṇavenāpyāyitāste manavastadudīritāḥ  evamāpyāyitā mantrā bhṛtyavatphaladāyakāḥ 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣādiharamantrabṛndanirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  pañcavatkrārcanaṃ vakṣye pṛtha gyadbhuktimuktidam  oṃ bhūrviṣṇave ādibhūtāya sarvādhārāya mūrtaye svāhā 
sadyojātasya cāhvānamanena prathamaṃ caret  oṃ hāṃ sadyojātāyaiva kalā hyaṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ 
siddhirṛddhirdhṛtirlakṣmīrmedhā kāntiḥ svadhā sthitiḥ   oṃ hīṃ vāmadevāyaiva kalāstasya trayodaśa 
rajā rakṣā ratiḥ pālyā kānti stṛṣṇā matiḥ kriyā  kāmā buddhiśca rātriśca trāsanī mohinī tathā  
manonmanī aghorā ca tathā mohā kṣudhā kalāḥ  nidrā mṛtyuśca māyā ca 
aṣṭasaṃkhyā bhayaṅkara 
oṃ haiṃ tatpuruṣāyaiva ṣāya
nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntirna kevalā 
oṃ hauṃ īśānāya namo niścalā ca nirañjanā  śaśinī cāṅganā caiva marīcirjvālinī tathā 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍaṃ pañcavakkrapūjanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  śivārcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi buktimuktikaraṃ param  śāntaṃ sarvagataṃ śūnyaṃ mātrādvādaśake sthitam 
pañca vakkrāṇi hrasvāni dīrghāṇyaṅgāni bindunā  savisargaṃ vadedastraṃ śiva ūrghvaṃ tathā punaḥ 
ṣaṣṭhenādho mahāmantro haumityevākhilārthadaḥ  hastābhyāṃ saṃspṛśetpādāvūrdhvaṃ pādānmastakam 
mahāmudrā hi sarveṣāṃ karāṅganyāsamācaret  tālahastena pṛṣṭhaṃ ca astramantreṇa śodhayet 
kaniṣṭhāmāditaḥ kṛtvā tarjanyaṅgāni vinyaset  pūjanaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi karṇikāyāṃ tdṛdambuje 
dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryādi tdṛdārcayet  āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca pādyamarghyaṃ hṛdārpayet 
ācāmaṃ snapanaṃ pūjāmekādhāraṇatulyakam  agnikāryavidhiṃ vakṣye astreṇollekhanaṃ caret 
varṃmaṇābhyukṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ śaktinyāsaṃ hṛdā caret  tdṛdi vā śaktigarte ca prakṣipejjātavedasam 
garbhādhānādikaṃ kṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ cārasya paścimām  hṛdā kṛtvā sarvakarṃma śivaṃ sāṃgaṃ tu homayet 
pūjayenmaṇḍale śambhuṃ padmagarbhe garāṅkitam  catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣi khādyādimaṇḍalam 
khākṣīndrasūryagaṃ sarvakhādivedendu devendu vartanam  āgneyyāṃ kārayetkuṇḍamardhacandranibhaṃ śubham 
agniśāstra parāyustho tdṛdayādigaṇocyate  astraṃ diśā supadmasya karṇikāyāṃ sadāśivaḥ 
dīkṣāṃ vakṣye pañcatattve sthitāṃ bhūmyādikāṃ pare  nivṛttirbhūpratiṣṭhādyairvidyāgniḥ śāntivannijaḥ 
śāntyatītaṃ bhavevdyoma tatparaṃ śāntamavyayam  ekaikasya śataṃ homā hatyevaṃ pañca homayet 
paścātpūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā prāpra
sodana śivaṃ smaret  prāyaścittaviśuddhyarthamekaikāṣṭāhutiṃ kramāt 
homayedastrabījena evaṃ dīkṣāṃ samāpayet  yajanavyatirekeṇa gopyaṃ saṃskāramuttamam 
evaṃ saṃskāraśuddhasya śivatvaṃ jāyate dhruvam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivārcanaprakāro nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  śivārcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharṃmakāmādisādhanam  tribhirmantrairācāmettu svāhāntaiḥ praṇavādikaiḥ 
oṃ hāṃ ātmatattvāya vidyātattvāya hīṃ tathā  oṃ hūṃ śivatattvāya svāhā hṛdā syācchrotravandanam 
bhasmasnānaṃ tarpaṇaṃ ca oṃ hāṃ svāhā sarvamantrakāḥ  sarve devāḥ sarvamunirnamo 'nto vauṣaḍantakaḥ 
svadhāntāḥ sarvapitaraḥ svadhāntāśca pitāmahāḥ  oṃ hāṃ prapitāmahebhyastathā mātāmahādayaḥ 
hāṃ namaḥ sarvamātṛbhyastataḥ syātprāṇasaṃyamaḥ  ācāmaṃ mārjanaṃ cātho gāyatrīṃ ca japettataḥ 
oṃ hāṃ tanmaheśāya vidmahe
vāgviśuddhāya dhīmahi
tanno rudraḥ pracodayāt 
sūryopasthānakaṃ kṛtvā sūryamantraiḥ prapūjayet  oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ haḥ śivasūryāya namaḥ  oṃ haṃ khakholkāya sūryamūrtaye namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ 
daṇḍine piṅgale tvātibhūtāni ca tataḥ smaret  agnayādau vimaleśānamārādhya paramaṃ sukham 
yajetpadmāṃ ca rāṃ dīptāṃ rīṃ sūkṣmāṃ rūṃ jayāṃ ca reṃ  bhadrāṃ ca raiṃ vibhūtiṃ roṃ vimalāṃ raumamodhi rodhi kām 
raṃ vidyutāṃ ca pūrvādau rā raṃ
madhye sarvatomukhīm  arkāsanaṃ sūryamūrteṃ hrāṃ hrūṃ hrīṃ
saḥ sūryamarcayet 
oṃ āṃ hṛdarkāya ca śiraḥ śikhā ca bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom  jvālinīṃ hraṃ kavacasya cāstraṃ rājñāṃ ca dīkṣitām 
yajetsūryahṛdā sarvānsoṃ somaṃ maṃ ca maṅgalam  baṃ budhaṃ bṛṃ bṛhaspatiṃ bhaṃ bhārgavaṃ śaṃ śanaiścaram 
raṃ rāhuṃ kaṃ yajetketuṃ oṃ tejaścaṇḍamarcayet  sūryamabhyarcya cācamya kaniṣṭhāto 'ṅgakāṃnyaset 
hāṃ hṛcchiro hūṃ śikhā haiṃ varṃma hauṃ caiva netrakam  ho 'straṃ śaktisthitiṃ kṛtvā bhūtaśuddhiṃ punarnyaset 
arghyapātraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tadadbhiḥ prokṣayedyajet 
ātmānaṃ padmasaṃsthaṃ ca hauṃ śivāya tato bahiḥ  dvāre nandimahākālau gaṅgā ca yamunātha gauḥ 
śrīrastraṃ vāstvadhipatiṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇaṃ gurum  śaktyanantau yajenmadhye pūrvādau dharṃmakādikam 
adharṃmādyaṃ ca vahnyādau madhye padmasya karṇike  vāmājyeṣṭhā ca pūrvādau raudrī kālī ca pūrṣadaḥ 
oṃ hauṃ kalavikariṇyai balavikariṇī tataḥ  balapramathinī sarvabhūtānāṃ damanī tataḥ 
manonmanī yajedetāḥ paṭhimadhye śivāgrataḥ  śivāsanaṃ mahāmūrti mūrtimadhye śivāya ca 
āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca sannidhānaṃ nirodhanam  sakalīkaraṇaṃ mudrādarśanaṃ cārghyapādyakam 
ācāmābhyaṅgamudvartaṃ snānaṃ nirṃmathanaṃ caret  vastraṃ vilepanaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ caruṃ dadet 
ācāmaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ hastaśodhanam  chatracāmarapāvitraṃ paramīkaraṇaṃ caret 
rūpakpena caikāhajapo jāpyasamarpaṇam  stutirnatirhṛdādyaiśca jñeyaṃ nāmāṅga pūjanam 
agnīśarakṣo vāyavye madhye pūrvāditantrakam  indrādyāṃśca yajeccaṇḍaṃ tasmai nirmālyamarpayet 
guhāyātiguhyagoptā tvaṃ gṛhāṇāsmatkṛtaṃ japam  siddhirbhavatu me deva tatprasādāttvayi sthitiḥ 
yatkiñcitkriyate karma sadā sukṛtaduṣkṛtam  tanme śivapadasthasya rudra kṣapaya śaṅkara 
śivo dātā śivo bhoktā śivaḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat  śivo jayati sarvatra yaḥ śivaḥ so 'hameva ca 
yatkṛtaṃ yatkariṣyāmi tatsarvaṃ sukṛtaṃ tavatastavam  tvaṃ trātā viśvanetā ca nānyonātho 'stimeśiva 
athānyena prakāreṇa śivapūjāṃ vadāmyaham  gaṇaḥ sarasvatī nandī mahākālo 'thagaṅgayā 
pavanāstraṃ vāstvadhipo dvāri pūrvāditastvime  indrādyāḥ pūjanīyāśca tattvāni pṛthivī jalam 
tejo vāyurvyoma gandho rasarūpe ca śabdakaḥ  sparśo vāk pāṇi pādaṃ ca pāyūpasthaṃ śrutitvacam 
cakṣurjihvā ghrāṇamano buddhiścāhaṃ prakṛtyapi  pumānnāgo buddhividye kalā kālo niyatyapi 
māyā ca śuddha vidyā ca īśvaraśca sadāśivaḥ  śaktiḥ śivaśca tāñjñātvā mukto jñānī śivo bhavet 
yaḥ śivaḥ sa harirbrahmā so 'haṃ brahmāsmi śaṅkara 
bhūtaśuddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi yayā śuddhaḥ śivo bhavet  hṛtpadme sadyomantraḥ syānnivṛttiśca kalā iḍā 
piṅgalā dve ca nāḍyau tu prāṇo 'pānaśca mārutau  indro deho brahmahetuścaturastraṃ ca maṇḍalam 
vaktreṇa lāñchitaṃ vāyumekoddhātaguṇāḥ śarāḥ  tdṛtsthānasādṛśyarutaṃ śatakoṭipravistaram 
oṃ hrīṃ pratiṣṭhāyai hrūṃ hraḥ phaṭ  oṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ vidyāyai hraṃ hraḥ phaṭ  caturaśītikoṭīnāmucchrayaṃ bhūmitantrakam 
tanmadhye bhavavṛkṣaṃ ca ātmānaṃ ca vicintayet  adhomukhīṃ tataḥ pṛthvīṃ tattacchudhdaṃ bhaveddhruvam 
vāmā devī pratiṣṭhā ca suṣumnā dhārikā tathā  samānodānavaruṇā devatā viṣṇu kāraṇam 
addhātāśca guṇā vedāḥ śvetaṃ dhyānaṃ tathaiva ca  evaṃ kuryātkaṇṭhapadmamardhacandrākhyamaṇḍalam 
padmāṅkitaṃ dviviṃśatikakoṭivistīrṇamau smaret  caturnavatyucchrayaṃ ca ātmānaṃ ca adhomukham 
tālusthānaṃ ca padmaṃ ca aghoro vidyayānvitaḥ  nābhyoḍyo ṣṭhayorhastijihvādhyāno nāgognidevatā 
rudrahetustriruddhātāstriguṇā raktavarṇakam  jvālākṛte trikoṇaṃ ca catuḥ koṭiśatāni ca 
vistīrṇaṃ ca samutsedhaṃ rudratattvaṃ vicintayet  lalāṭe vai tatpuruṣaḥ śāntiryaḥ śādvalaṃ budhāḥ vṛṣā 
kūrmaśca kṛkaro vāyurdeva īśvarakāraṇam  dviruddhāto guṇau dvau ca dhūmraṣaṭkoṇamaṇḍalam 
bindvaṅkitaṃ cāṣṭakoṭivistīrṇaṃ cocchrayastathā  caturdaśādhikaṃ koṭivāyutattvaṃ vicintayet 
dvādaśati sarasije śāntya tītāstatheśvarāḥ  kuhūśca śaṅkhinī nāḍyo devadatto dhanañjayaḥ 
śikhaiśānakāraṇaṃ ca sadāśiva iti smṛtaḥ  guṇa ekastathoddhātaḥ śuddhasphaṭikavatsmaret 
ṣoḍaśakoṭivistīrṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatikocchrayam  vartulaṃ cintayevdyoma bhutaśuddhirudāhṛtā 
guṇayo gururbojaguruḥ śaktayanantau ca dharṃmakaḥ  jñānavairāgyamaiśvaryaistataḥ pūrvādipatrake 
adhordhvavadane dve ca padmakarṇikakesaram  vāmādyā ātmavidyā ca sadā dhyāyecchivākhyakam 
tattvaṃ śivāsane mūrtirhe hauṃ vidyādehāya namaḥ  baddhapadmāsanāsīnaḥ sitaḥ ṣoḍaśavārṣikaḥ 
pañcavaktraḥ karāgraiḥ svairdaśabhiścaiva dhārayan  abhayaṃ prasādaṃ śaktiṃ śūlaṃ khaṭvāṅgamīśvaraḥ 
dakṣaiḥ karairvāmakaiśca bhujaṅgaṃ cākṣasūtrakam  ḍamarukaṃ nīlotpalaṃ bījapūrakamuttamam 
icchājñānakriyāśaktistrinetro hi sadāśivaḥ  evaṃ śivārcanadhyānī sarvadā kālavarjitaḥ 
ihāhorā vacāreṇa trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati  dinadvayasya cāreṇa jīvedvarṣadvayaṃ naraḥ 
dinatrayasya cāreṇa varṣamekaṃ sa jīvati  nākāle śītale mṛtyuruṣṇe caiva tu kārake 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivārcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
iti śivādipūjā samāptā  śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  vakṣye gaṇādikāḥ pūjāḥ sarvadā svargadāḥ parāḥ  gaṇāsanaṃ gaṇamūrti gaṇādhipatimarcayet 
gāmādihṛdayādyaṅgaṃ durgāyā gurupādukāḥ  durgāsanaṃ ca tanmūrtiṃ hrīṃ durge rakṣaṇīti ca 
tdṛdādikaṃ nava śaktyo rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍayā  caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā caṇḍā caṇḍavatī kramāt 
caṇārūpā caṇḍikākhyā durgedurge 'tha rakṣiṇi  vajrakhaḍgādikā mudrāḥ śivādyā vahnideśataḥ 
sadāśivamahāpretapadmāsana mathāpi vā  aiṃ klīṃ hrīṃ
saustripurāyai namaḥ  oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ kṣeṃ kṣaiṃ strīṃ skīṃ roṃ spheṃ sphīṃ śāṃ padmāsanaṃ ca mūrtiṃ ca tripurātdṛdayādikam 
pīṭhāmbuje tu brāhayādīrbrahmāṇī ca maheśvarī  kaumārī vaiṣṇavī pūjyā vārāhī cendradevatā 
cāmuṇḍā caṇḍikā pūjyā bhairavākhyāṃstato yajet  asitāṅgoruruścaṇḍaḥ krodha unmattabhairavaḥ 
kapālī bhīṣaṇaścaiva saṃhāraścāṣṭa bhairavāḥ  ratiḥ prītiḥ kāmadevaḥ pañca bāṇāśca yoginī 
vaṭukaṃ durgayā vighnarājo guruśca kṣetrapaḥ  padmagarbhe maṇḍale ca trikoṇe cintayeddhṛdi 
śuklāṃ varadākṣasūtrapustābhayasamanvitām  lakṣajapyācca homācca tripurā siddhidā bhavet 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tripurādipūjānirūpaṇaṃ nam caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  aiṃ krīṃ śrīṃ spheṃ kṣaiṃ anantaśaktipādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ 
aiṃ śrīṃ phraiṃ kṣaiṃ ādhāraśaktipādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ  oṃ hraṃ kālāgnirudrapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ 
oṃ hrīṃ huṃ hāṭakeśvaradevapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ śeṣabhaṭṭārakapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ 
oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ pūthivītatsavarṇabhuvanadvīpasamudradiśāmanantākhyamāsanaṃ padmāsanaṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ 
hrīṃ śrīṃ nivṛttyādi kalā pṛthivyāditattva manantādibhuvanamoṅkārādivarṇam  hakārādinavātmakapadaḥ sadyodātādimantraḥ hrāṃ hṛdayādyaṅgaḥ  evaṃ mantramaheśvara siddhavidyātmakaḥ parāmṛtārṇavaḥ sarvabhūto diksamastaṣaḍaṅgaḥ
sadāśivārṇavapayaḥ pūrṇodadhipakṣaśrīmānāspadātmakaḥ vidyomāpūrṇajñatvakartṛtvalakṣaṇajyeṣṭhācakrarudraśaktyātmakakarṇi kaḥ  navaśaktiśivādibhirmūlamaṇḍalatrayakujātmakotpannāpadmāsanapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āsanapūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgarūḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  anantaraṃ karanyāsaḥ  vidyākarī śuddhiḥ kāryā  padmamudrāṃ baddhvā mantranyāsaṃ kuryāt  kaiṃ kaniṣṭhāyai namaḥ  naiṃ anāmikāyai namaḥ  maiṃ madhyamāyai namaḥ  taiṃ tarjanyai namaḥ  aṃ aṅguṣṭhāyai namaḥ  lāṃ karatalāyai namaḥ  vāṃ karapṛṣṭhāyai namaḥ 
atha dehanyāsaḥ  smaṃsmaṃ maṇibandhāya namaḥ  aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ karāsphālāya namaḥ  mahātejorūpaṃ huṃhuṅkāreṇa karāsphālanaṃ kuryāt 
aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ sphaiṃ namo bhagavate sphaiṃ kubjīkāyai namaḥ  hraṃ hrīṃ hrauṃ ṅañaṇaname aghorāmukhi hrāṃ hrīṃ kilikili vicce sthaulyakrośī hrīṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ aiṃ namo bhagavate urdhvavaktrāya namaḥ  sphaiṃ kubjikāyai pūrvavaktrāya namaḥ  hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ ṅaāñaṇaname dakṣiṇavaktrāya namaḥ  oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ kilikili paścimavaktrāya namaḥ  oṃ akhoramukhi uttaravaktrāya namaḥ  oṃ namo bhagavate hṛdayāya namaḥ kṣaiṃ kṣeṃ aiṃ
kubjikāyai śirase svāhā  hrīṃ krīṃ hrīṃ āṃ ṅa ña ṇa name śikhāyai vaṣaṭ  aghorāmukhi kavacāya huṃ  haiṃ haiṃ īṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ  kilikili vicce astrāya phaṭ 
 aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ akhaṇḍamaṇḍalākāramahāśūlamaṇḍalamāya namaḥ 
aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ vāyumaṇḍalāya namaḥ   aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ somamaṇḍalāya namaḥ   aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ mahākulabodhāvalimaṇḍalāya namaḥ 
aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ mahākaulamaṇḍalāya namaḥ   aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ gurumaṇḍalāya namaḥ 
aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ sāmamaṇḍalāya namaḥ
aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ samagra 
siddha 
yogīnīpīṭhāpapīṭha 
kṣetrepakṣetramahāsantānamaṇḍalāya namaḥ  evaṃ maṇḍalānāṃ dvādaśakaṃ krameṇa pūjyam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe ācārakāṇḍe karanyāsādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  oṃ kaṇicikīṇikakrāṇī carvāṇī bhūtahāriṇi phaṇiviṣiṇi virathanārāyayaṇi ume dahadaha
haste caṇḍe raudre māheśvari mahāmukhi jvālāmukhi śaṅkukarṇi śukamuṇḍe śatruṃ hanahana
sarvanāśini svedaya sarvāṅgaśoṇitaṃ tannirīkṣāsi manasā devi saṃmohayasaṃmohaya rudrasya
hṛdaye jātā rudrasya tdṛdaye sthitā  rudro raudreṇa rūpeṇa tvaṃ devi rakṣarakṣa māṃ hrūṃ māṃ hrūṃ phaphapha ṭhaṭhaḥ skandamekhalābālagrahaśatruviṣahārī
oṃ śāle māle harahara viṣoṅkārarahiviṣavege hāṃ hāṃ śavari huṃ śavari ākaulavegeśe
sarve viñcameghamāle sarvanāgādiviṣaharaṇam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nāgādivividhaviṣahara mantranirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  gopālapūjāṃ vakṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradāyinīm  dvāre dhātā vidhātā ca gaṅgāyamunayā saha 
śaṅkhapadmanidhī caiva sāraṅgaḥ śarabhaḥ śriyā  pūrve bhadraḥ subhadro dvau dakṣe caṇḍapracaṇḍakau 
paścime balaprabalau jayaśca vijayo yajet  uttare śrīścaturdvāre gaṇo durgā sarasvatī 
kṣetrasyāgnyādikoṇeṣu dikṣu nāradapūrvakam  siddho gururnalakūvaraṃ koṇe bhagavataṃ yajet 
pūrve viṣṇuṃ viṣṇutapo viṣṇuśaktiṃ samarcayet  tato viṣṇuparīvāraṃ madhye śaktiṃ ca kūrṃmakam 
anantaṃ pṛthivīṃ dharmaṃ jñānaṃ vairāgyamagnitaḥ  aiśvaryaṃ vāyupūrvaṃ ca prakāśātmānamuttare 
sattvāya prakṛtātmane rajase moharūpiṇe  tamase kanda padmāya yajetkaṃ kākatattvakam 
vidyātattvaṃ paraṃ tattva sūryeduvahnimaṇḍalam  vimalādyā āsanaṃ ca prācyāṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ prapūjayet 
gopījanavallabhāya svāhānto manurucyate  aṅgāni yathāāca kraṃ ca sucakraṃ ca vicakraṃ ca tathaica 
trailokyarakṣakaṃ cakramasurārisudarśanam  hṛdādipūrvakoṇaṣu astraṃ śaktiṃ ca pūrvataḥ 
rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca sunandā nāgnajityapi  lakṣmaṇā mitravindā ca jāmbavatyā śuśīlayā 
śaṅkhacakragadāpadmaṃ musalaṃ śārṅgamarcayet  khaṅgaṃ pāśāṅkuśaṃ prācyāṃ śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ yajet 
mukuṭaṃ valamālāṃ ca aindrādyāndhvajamukhyakān  kumudādyānviṣvaksenaṃ śriyā kṛṣṇaṃ sahārcayet  japyāddhyānātpūjanācca sarvānkāmānavānpuyāt  iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīgopālapūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
hariruvāca  trailokyamohinīṃ vakṣye puruṣottamamukhyakām  pūjāmantrāñchrīdharādyāndharṃmakāmādidāyakān 
oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ hrūṃ oṃ namaḥ  puruṣottama apratirūpa lakṣmīnivāsa jagatkṣobhaṇa sarvastrīhṛdayadāraṇa tribhuvanamadonmādanakara
surāsuramanuja suṃdarī janamanāṃsi tāpayatāpaya śoṣayaśoṣaya mārayamāraya stambhayastambhaya
drāvayadrāvaya ākarṣaya ākarṣaya
paramasubhaga sarvasaubhāgyakara sarvakāmaprada amukaṃ hanahana cakreṇa gadayā khaḍgena
sarvabāṇairbhidhibhindhi pāśena kuṭṭakuṭṭa aṅkuśena tāḍayatāḍaya turuturu kiṃ tiṣṭhasi
tārayatāraya yāvatsamīhitaṃ me siddhaṃ bhavati hrīṃ hrūṃ
phaṭ namaḥ 
oṃ śrīṃ śrīḥ
śrīdharāya trailokyamohanāya namaḥ  klīṃ puruṣottamāya trailokyamohanāya namaḥ 
oṃ viṣṇave trailokyamohanāya namaḥ  oṃ śrīṃ klīṃ trailokyamohanāya vipṇave namaḥ 
trailokyamohanā mantrāḥ sarve sarvārthasādhakāḥ  sarve cintyā pṛthag vāpi vyāsātsaṃkṣepato 'tha vā 
āsanaṃ mūrtimantraṃ ca homādyaṅgaṣaḍaṅgakam  cakraṃ gadāṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca musalaṃ śaṃmakhaśarṅgakam 
śaraṃ pāśaṃ cāṅkuśaṃ ca lakṣmīgaruḍasaṃyutam  viṣvaksenaṃ vistarādvānaraḥ sarvamavāpnuyāt 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāḍe trailokyamohinīśrīdhara
pūjanavidhirnāmaikonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam 
sūta uvāca  vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi śrīdharasyārcanaṃ śubham  parivāraśca sarveṣāṃ samojñeyo hi paṇḍitaiḥ 
oṃ śrāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ  oṃ śrīṃśirase svāhā  oṃ śrū śikhāyai vaṣaṭū  oṃ śraiṃ kavacāya huṃ  oṃ śrauṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ  oṃ śraḥ astrāya phaṭ iti 
darśayedātmano mudrāṃ śaṅkhacakragadādikām  dhyātvātmānaṃ śrīdharākhyaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam 
tatastaṃ pūjayeddevaṃ maṇḍale svastikādike  āsanaṃ pūjayedādau devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ  ebirmantrairmahādeva tānmatrāñchṛṇu śaṅkara 
oṃ śrīdharāsanadevatāḥ āgacchatā  oṃ samastaparivārāyacyutāsanāya namaḥ 
oṃ dhātre namaḥ  oṃ vidhātre namaḥ  oṃ gaṅgāyai namaḥ  oṃ yamunāyai namaḥ  oṃ ādhāraśaktayai namaḥ  oṃ kūrṃmāya namaḥ  oṃ anantāya namaḥ  oṃ pṛthivyai namaḥ  oṃ dharṃmāya namaḥ  oṃ jñānāya namaḥ  oṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ  oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ  oṃ adharṃmāya namaḥ  oṃ ajñānāya namaḥ  oṃ avairāgyāya namaḥ  oṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ  oṃ kandāya namaḥ  oṃ nālāya namaḥ  oṃ padmāya namaḥ  oṃ vimalāyai namaḥ  oṃ utkarṣiṇyai namaḥ  oṃ jñānāyai namaḥ  oṃ kriyāyai namaḥ  oṃ yogāyai namaḥ  oṃ prahvyai namaḥ  oṃ satyāyai namaḥ  oṃ īśānāyai namaḥ  oṃ anugrahāyai namaḥ 
arcayitvā samaṃ rudra harimāvāhya saṃyajet  mantrairebhirmahāprājñaḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanaiḥ 
oṃ hrīṃ śrīdharāya trailokyamohanāya viṣṇave namaḥ āgaccha 
oṃ śriyai namaḥ  oṃ śrāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ  oṃ śrīṃ śirase namaḥ  oṃ śrūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ  oṃ śraiṃ kavacāya namaḥ  oṃ śrauṃ netratrayāya namaḥ  oṃ śraḥ astrāya namaḥ  oṃ śaṅkhāya namaḥ  oṃ padmāya namaḥ  oṃ cakrāya namaḥ  oṃ gadāyai namaḥ  oṃ śrī vatsāya namaḥ  oṃ kaustubhya namaḥ  oṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ  oṃ pītāmbarāya namaḥ  oṃ vrahmaṇe namaḥ  oṃ nāradāya namaḥ  oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ  oṃ indrāya namaḥ  oṃ agnaye namaḥ  oṃ yamāya namaḥ  oṃ nirṛtaye namaḥ  oṃ varuṇāya namaḥ  oṃ vāyave namaḥ  oṃ somāya namaḥ  oṃ īśānāya namaḥ  oṃ anantāya namaḥ  oṃ brahmaṇe namaḥ  oṃ sattvāya namaḥ  oṃ rajase namaḥ  oṃ tamase namaḥ  oṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ 
abhiṣekaṃ tathā vasttraṃ tato yajñopavītakam  gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpamannaṃ pradakṣiṇam 
dadyādebhirmahāmantraiḥ samapyārtha japenmanum  śatamaṣṭottaraṃ cāpi japtvā hyatha samarpayet 
tato muhūrtamekantudhyāyeddevaṃ hṛdi sthitam  śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabham 
prasannavadanaṃ saumyaṃ sphuranmakarakuṇḍalam  kirīṭinamudārāṅgaṃ vanamālāsamanvitam 
parabrahmasvarūpaṃ ca śrīdharaṃ cintayetsudhīḥ  anena caiva stotreṇa stuvīta parameśvaram 
śrīnivāsāya devāya namaḥ śrīpataye namaḥ  śrīdharāya saśārṅgāya śrīpradāya namonamaḥ 
śrīvallabhāya śāntāya śrīmate ca namonamaḥ  śrīparvatanivāsāya namaḥ śreyaskarāya ca 
śreyasāṃ pataye caiva hyāśramāya namonamaḥ  namaḥ śreyaḥ svarūpāya śrīkarāya namonamaḥ 
śaraṇyāya vareṇyāya namo bhūyo namonamaḥ  stotraṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtya devadevaṃ visarjayet 
iti rudra samākhyātā pūjā viṣṇormahātmanaḥ  yaḥ karoti mahābhaktyā sa yāti paramaṃ padam 
iṃ yaḥ paṭhate 'dhyāyaṃ viṣṇupūjāprakāśakam  sa vidhūyeha pāpāni yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam 
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīdharā viṣṇvar
canavidhirnāma triṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍamahāpurāṇam 
rudra uvāca  bhūya evaṃ jagannātha pūjāṃ kathaya me prabho  yayā tareyaṃ saṃsārasāgaraṃ hyatidustaram 
hariruvāca  arcanaṃ viṣṇudevasya vakṣyāmi vṛṣabhadhvaja  tacchṛṇuṣva mahābhāga bhuktimuktipradaṃ śubham 
kṛtvā snānaṃ tataḥ sandhyāṃ tato yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet  prakṣālya pāṇī pādau ca ācamya ca viśeṣataḥ 
mūlamantraṃ samastaṃ tu hastayorvyāpakaṃ nyaset  mūlamantraṃ ca devasya śṛṇu rudra vadāmi te 
oṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ śrīdharāya viṣṇave namaḥ  ayaṃ mantraḥ sureśasya viṣṇorīśasya vācakaḥ 
sarvavyādhiharaścaiva sarvagrahaharastathā  sarvapāpaharaścaiva buktimuktipradāyakaḥ 
aṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ kuyyāndebhirmantraurvicakṣaṇaḥ  oṃ hāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ  oṃ hīṃ śirase svāhā  oṃ hūṃ śikhāyai vaṣaṭ  oṃ haiṃ kavacāya huṃ  oṃ hauṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ  oṃ haḥ astrāya phaṭ 
iti mantraḥ samākhyāto mayā te prabhaviṣṇunā  nyāsaṃ kṛtvātmano mudrāṃ darśayedvijitātmavān 
tato dhyāyetparaṃ viṣṇu tdṛtkoṭarasamāśritam  śaṅkhacakrasamāyuktaṃ kundendudhavalaṃ harim 
śrīvatsakaustubhayutaṃ vanamālāsamanvitam  ratnahārakirīṭena saṃyuktaṃ parameśvaram 
ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā kṛtvā vai śodhanādikam  yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinī kṛtya nāmabhiḥ 
aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ praṇavenaiva bhedayet  tatra pūrvoktarūpaṃ tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja 
ātmapūjāṃ tataḥ kuryādrandhapuṣpādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ  āvāhya pūjayetsarvā devatā āsanasya yāḥ 
mantrairebhirmahādeva tanmantraṃ śṛṇu śaṅkara  viṣṇavāsanadevatā āgacchata 
oṃ samastaparivārāyācyutāya namaḥ  oṃ dhātre namaḥ  oṃ vidhātre namaḥ  oṃ gaṅgāyai namaḥ  oṃ yamunāyai namaḥ  oṃ śaṅkhanidhaye namaḥ  oṃ padmanidhaye namaḥ  oṃ caṇḍāya namaḥ  oṃ pracaṇḍāya namaḥ  oṃ dvāraśriyai namaḥ  oṃ ādhāraśaktyai namaḥ  oṃ kūrṃmāya namaḥ  oṃ anantāya namaḥ  oṃ śriyai namaḥ  oṃ dharṃmāya namaḥ  oṃ jñānāya namaḥ  oṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ  oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ  oṃ adharṃmāya namaḥ  oṃ ajñānāya namaḥ  oṃ avairāgyāya namaḥ  oṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ  oṃsaṃ sattvāya namaḥ  oṃ raṃ rajase namaḥ  oṃ taṃ tamase namaḥ  oṃ kaṃ kandāya namaḥ  oṃ naṃ nālāya namaḥ  oṃ lāṃ padmāya namaḥ  oṃ aṃ arkamaṇḍalāya namaḥ  oṃ soṃ somamaṇḍalāya namaḥ  oṃ vaṃ vahnimaṇḍalāya namaḥ  oṃ vimalāyai namaḥ  oṃ utkarṣiṇyai namaḥ  oṃ jñānāyai namaḥ  oṃ kriyāyai namaḥ  oṃ yogāyai namaḥ  oṃ prahvyai namaḥ  oṃ satyāyai namaḥ  oṃ īśānāyai namaḥ  oṃ anugrahāyai namaḥ
